features: Elevate Your Skincare Routine: Experience a radiant transformation with Natural Outcome's C-Brilliance Vitamin C Toner. This rejuvenating toner revitalizes your skin, leaving it refreshed and ready to face the day, while also helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Powerful Ingredients: Our formula harnesses the clarifying ability of antioxidant Vitamin C infused Kakadu Plum and anti aging Bilberry Fruit Extracts, combined with the pore minimizing witch hazel and moisturizing aloe vera. Citrus extracts of lemon and orange add a burst of natural freshness to your daily skincare regimen.

For All Skin Types: Designed for all skin types oily skin, dry skin and gentle enough for sensitive skin. Great for men and women looking for skin brilliance. After cleansing, just soak a cotton pad and gently sweep it across your face and neck. Use it morning and night for a burst of vitamin C balancing goodness.

Clean Beauty, Pure Results: We take pride in our commitment to clean ingredients Our facial toner is fragrance-free, alcohol free, paraben-free, vegan, cruelty-free, and sulfate-free, ensuring that your skincare routine is as pure as it is effective.

Natural Outcome: We're not just a brand; we're a skincare philosophy. At Natural Outcome, our focus is on delivering real, visible outcomes for your skin. Plus, all our products are proudly made by us in the USA, so you can trust in the quality and integrity of what you're applying to your skin.
body.description: Elevate your skincare routine with Natural Outcome's C-Brilliance active Vitamin C Toner, a rejuvenating essential that unveils your skin's true glow. Infused with potent Kakadu Plum and Bilberry Fruit Extracts, this tonic lotion works to wash away harm and even your complexion, while pore refining and minimizing witch hazel and hydrating aloe vera provide a refreshing boost. Invigorating citrus extracts of lemon and orange awaken your senses as they refresh your skin. Applying it is a breeze – simply saturate a cotton pad and gently sweep it across your face and neck after using a cleanser and before applying your serum and moisturizer. Use it morning and night to maximize its benefits and watch your skin transform. Our commitment to clean beauty means it's fragrance-free, paraben-free, vegan, cruelty-free, and sulfate-free. This facial toner is great for men, women and teens and for all skin types including toning dry, sensitive, oily, acne prone skin types. Proudly made in the USA, Natural Outcome combines the best of nature and science to deliver visible outcomes, ensuring you can trust the purity and quality of your skin care. This is no ordinary face toner recipe get an organic skin glow with Natural Outcome's C-Brilliance Vitamin C Toners today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this toner to put on after I wash my face. I've been using it for a couple weeks now. I haven't noticed the tone of my face change any, but it does moisturize my face. It does get off dirt/ makeup that I missed while washing my face also. I'm happy with the toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay vitamin C toner
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this toner for a few months now and so far I think the product is okay. The toner burned my skin a little a few times but it only happens sometimes. Other than that, I think the item is good at hydrating my skin as a toner. I like the vitamin C aspect of it because I needed vitamin C in my routine. The smell is somewhat strong though so I don't enjoy that as much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does everything it says and feels like it's working as soon as I rub it onto my skin!The price to performance is on point and I'm really satisfied with the results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I've heard a lot lately about the benefits of Vitamin C and wanted give it a try with this Vitamin C toner. I was hesitant because I have dry skin and toner is known to be a better choice for oily skin, not dry. However, the listing says it's good for all skin types and contains moisturizing aloe vera. I've tried it twice and both times, even after applying lotion, my skin has felt dry and uncomfortable. There was a burning sensation during application, but it did not last or leave my skin red. This is a large bottle of toner, but I did not like the container it came in. It literally poured out the spout and a cotton ball is recommended and needed. I think a regular bottle cap would be a better choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A western style toner
reviews.reviewText: I'm more used to Asian toners which are typically very hydrating. Western style toners are usually quite drying and this is more that type. Witch hazel especially is drying so unless you have oily skin this may be too drying for you. Vitamin C is a great product for brightening though so I love that they added it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin feels super clean after using this
reviews.reviewText: I have been reading about how to achieve that luminous look and applying toner was one of the recommendations. I have been using toner and I decided to try this one because I feel that Vitamin C products do help to brighten my complexion.This toner is a clear liquid in a large, simple plastic bottle with a flip top, so I apply the product using a cotton pad. I would describe the sensation as "tingly," short of a burning sensation, that leaves my skin feeling ultra clean. It really removes makeup and any oils, and the astringent properties seem to close the pores after cleansing. Although it works fine for my mature skin, if I had a teen granddaughter I would definitely recommend it for her.I love that this product is made in the USA without parabens. It feels like it might help to brighten my complexion and it definitely leaves my skin feeling clean and tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice quality
reviews.reviewText: Great toner. Not too aggressive or drying. Been using it every few days to really get my pores clean and it's worked well. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toner is a watery liquid with no strong odor/ fragrance. I do feel the mild tingling sensations after use in the morning. I use it in conjunction with other Vitamin C lotions to amp up the brightening benefits. Not too drying, no adverse reactions. But it’d likely be more welcoming to people with oily skins or for use in summers. While I enjoy toners and essences, I may not use this vitamin C toner on a daily basis due to its astringent-like quality. I also dislike its dispensing mechanism via a flip top cap. Typically toners use a dropper type top or a spray.This may be a good introductory option for those who want to start a less intense vitamin C regimen. Made in USA.

I have combination skin which often looks dull and has uneven tone, making me search for a product that can brighten, balance, and refresh my skin. I decided to try the Vitamin C Toner, which seemed like the perfect candidate.The product comes in simple and sleek packaging, with a convenient spray nozzle and cap. The clear toner has no fragrance, which is what I prefer. Applying it is easy, I just have to spray it on a cotton pad or directly on my face after cleansing. The toner gives a gentle and soothing feeling without causing dryness or stinging. Its impressive ingredient list, including natural sources of vitamin C, makes me feel confident that it's suitable for my daily skincare routine.After using the toner for a few weeks, I noticed positive changes in my skin. My complexion looks more radiant and even, and my skin feels softer and smoother. The toner helps keep my skin hydrated and nourished, without causing any irritation or breakouts. Although I cannot comment on the long-term effects due to my short period of use, my overall experience has been exceptionally positive.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love that it's scentless. Bottle doesn't seem to be designed for skin care
reviews.reviewText: Thankfully this came with a sealed bottle because the exterior box was beat up and open upon arrival. I have a vitamin C serum but don't use it much since it is a bit heavy and sometimes breaks me out. This being a toner feels much lighter and it's easy to add it to my routine without replacing anything in my current routine. It doesn't have any scents and is similar to my vitamin C serum, except lighter, which I appreciate. It is very watery and drips down the sides of the bottle when I directly squeeze some into my palms due to the design of the bottle dispenser. The product does suggest using a cotton pad which would solve this issue, but I do not like applying my toners with cotton pads since it wastes product and introduces unnecessary waste.It does mention it's good for 12 Months after opening, but I'm not sure how stable this product is since vitamin c is supposedly pretty unstable and lose efficacy quickly, so I plan to use this daily unless I have breakouts going on and need a bare routine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Leaves Your Skin Feeling Clean & Fresh!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. Has a nice clean barely there citrusy scent. Not to confuse things as it does say fragrance free but that just implies they haven't added any fragrance. But I love the smell as when I first opened it I detected a light pleasant citrusy smell. Then I read the ingredients and there is a citrus uranium dulcet fruit extract as well as lemon fruit extract. And I smell it and it is lovely but barely there. So if you have an issues with scents this won't bother you as most reviewers say it has no scent. And it feels very good on my skin and makes my skin feel very good too. My skin tends by days end to be a bit oily so this is quite refreshing, feels good and cleans my skin leaving it feeling great. The bottle itself with the cap has some issues. I find opening and holding it right to the cotton pad gives you a bit without it getting messy because when I held it aloft and used it I found it running everywhere. So far everything to love and aside from being careful to get it all on the cotton pad everything about this product is good!

I have been using this astringent 2x a day for about 2.5 weeks now. There is no odour to the product. I apply it with a cotton pad and it goes on smoothly. It's too soon to notice any major positive results, however, I think there's a spot on my face that has faded a little after using this product. That's a good thing. I'm keeping my eye on it and hope it disappears completely. Also, I feel my complexion looks a bit brighter since I've started using this. I will keep using this product.

Arrived bubble wrapped and in a fairly tight fitting box, which I’m sure kept it safe during travel. No leaks or damage upon arriving.C-Brilliance vitamin C toner for face, contains witch hazel, aloe Vera, kakadu plum and bilberry fruit. This combination is great for skin brightening, fighting fine lines, and hydrating. This toner is made in USA, is alcohol, paraben, vegan, cruelty, dye and fragrance free.Use this toner after cleansing face with a cotton pad.I’ve really liked this toner, feels like it refreshes my skin, giving it an extra clean feeling.Truly frangrace free. Doesn’t leave my skin dried out or sticky feeling. The bottle size is also a good size, will last a little while.So far quite pleased with product. Made for all skin types.
